name: Family Composition
author: Lisa DeBruine
description: Responses to a brief questionnaire about family composition.

variableMeasured.name: momage
variableMeasured.description: How old was your female parent when you were born?

variableMeasured.name: dadage
variableMeasured.description: How old was your male parent when you were born?

variableMeasured.name: oldbro
variableMeasured.description: How many older brothers do you have?

variableMeasured.name: oldsis
variableMeasured.description: How many older sisters do you have?

variableMeasured.name: youngbro
variableMeasured.description: How many younger brothers do you have?

variableMeasured.name: youngsis
variableMeasured.description: How many younger sisters do you have?

variableMeasured.name: twinbro
variableMeasured.description: How many same-age (e.g. twin) brothers do you have?

variableMeasured.name: twinsis
variableMeasured.description: How many same-age (e.g. twin) sisters do you have?
